DOC.criteria: Caucasian Normal blood pressure ( SBP 100140 mmHg , DBP 6090 mmHg ) weight stable last 3 month Smokers people intensive fitness training ( e.g . athlete > 3 times/week ) History cardiovascular disease Bleeding disorder Use medication interfere study endpoints/hypotheses ( e.g . betablockers ) Not able understand study information Subjects special diet vegetarian Blood donation 2 month prior study study Participating study
